metadata.description: This ruleset detects embedded cache libraries, which may be problematic when migrating an application to a cloud environment.

classification.title: Caching - Ehcache embedded library
classification.description:
The application embeds an Ehcache library.
An embedded cache library is problematic because state information might not be persisted to a backing service.
Recommendation: Use a cache backing service.
